update FeedBack
ParentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ClassCourseId = #{classcourseid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FileId = #{fileid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update FeedBack set ParentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ClassCourseId = #{classcourseid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FileId = #{fileid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FeedBackCode = #{feedbackcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TeacherCode = #{teachercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where FeedBackID = #{feedbackid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM FeedBack WHERE TeacherCode = #{teachercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ParentId = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY FeedBackID DESC

SELECT
FROM FeedBack WHERE ClassCourseId IN (SELECT ClassCourseID from class_course_student where StudentCode = #{usercode}) AND ParentId = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY FeedBackID DESC limit #{start}, #{length}
